titleInfo.title: Letter from Captain Henry Hardy, in charge at Bushire to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is reporting that Captain Hardy has sent for Rama bin Jauber [Raḥmah bin Jābir] and cautioned the Shaikh of Bahrain not to commence hostilities against him prior to the arrival of the new Resident; it notes that a similar warning has also been issued to Sooltan bin Suggur [Sulṭān bin Saqr].It also reports that as of 15 November 1823, Captain Sealy has assumed charge of the squadron in the Persian Gulf as Senior Marine Officer.
